charges.charge_description: Deft Knowingly, unlawfully and intentionally combine, conspire, confederate and agree with each other and others, known and unknown, to possess with the intent to distribute a controlled substance.  This violation involved five (5) kilograms or more of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of cocaine, a Schedule II controlled substance; In violation of 21 USC 846, 841(a)(1) &; 841(b, 21:846=CD.F

charges.charge_disposition: 60 months confinemnt for each count to run concurrently; 5 yrs SPR for each count to run concurrenlty, $100 SA for each count (total $300); $5,000 fine for each count to run concurrent

charges.charge_offence_description: Deft Knowingly, unlawfully and intentionally combi
